column1: #Text=Korra says : " If only we had a plane to get me close to those ships .
#Text=Well , why did n't you say so ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Um , why do you have a plane on your boat ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " In case the boat sinks , of course .
#Text=" Asami says : " But there 's no runway .
#Text=How are we supposed to take off ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I have an idea .
